amendment.description: To obtain assurances and a timetable for payments of U.S. contractors by the Egyptian Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2016 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2016 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S13367; text: CR S13367) To obtain assurances and a timetable for payments of U.S. contractors by the Egyptian Government.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2016 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2016 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dodd.
